1183350.name: Relivium
1183350.description:
Relivium is a first person single-player survival horror game set in 1946 after the end of World War II.





The Game Tells the story of a marine officer from the fictional country Hellkrankheit called Harvy Raymond, who is searching for his wife and daughter after the outbreak of a dormant aquatic parasite called Prorepo stercoralis.

In Relivium you can expect a tailored storyline, complete with gameplay concepts like resource management, exploration and a robust combat to go with the infected you will face, but be aware that none of that will help you against a mysterious presence that haunts you...
1183350.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
